mapper.select: SELECT N.bno, title, writer, bcontent, create_date, modify_date, org_file_name, stored_file_name, file_size FROM TB_NOTICE N LEFT JOIN TB_FILE F ON(N.bno = F.bno) WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY N.bno DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE VALUES(TB_NOTICE_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{id}, #{text}, sysdate, sysdate, default)
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, BCONTENT = #{text} WHERE BNO = #{no}
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE BNO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FILE VALUES( TB_FILE_NO.nextval, TB_NOTICE_BNO.currval, #{org_file_name}, #{stored_file_name}, #{file_size}, sysdate, default)
mapper.select: SELECT org_file_name, stored_file_name, file_size FROM TB_NOTICE N LEFT JOIN TB_FILE F ON(N.bno = F.bno) WHERE N.BNO = #{BNO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SUPPLY_APPLICATION VALUES(TB_SUPPLY_APPLICATION_ANO.nextval, #{eno}, #{scode}, #{sname}, SYSDATE, #{count}, #{comment}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS waitCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS failCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS successCount FROM SUPPLY_APPLICATION_VIEW WHERE eno = #{eno}
SELECT * FROM SUPPLY_APPLICATION_VIEW WHERE eno = #{eno} ORDER BY APPLICATE_DATE DESC
SELECT S.*, SS.scount FROM TB_SUPPLY S JOIN TB_SUPPLY_STOCK SS ON(S.scode = SS.scode)
